explanation: [0-0] A white bowl filled with white frosting is placed on a wooden table. Above it is the white English text "How to decorate your sugar cookies."

[0-4] Then, a hand holding a bottle of green food coloring uses the right hand to open the food coloring bottle, revealing the green food coloring. Using a toothpick dipped in the green food coloring, some curved lines are drawn on the frosting.
